channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel NVMe and Intel RSTe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel NVMe and Intel RSTe

item.title: CVE-2018-12131|2024-08-05T08:30:57.453Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20nvme%20and%20intel%20rste
item.description: Permissions in the driver pack installers for Intel NVMe before version 4.0.0.1007 and Intel RSTe before version 4.7.0.2083 may allow an authenticated user to potentially escalate privilege via local access.
